title: The Question Mark
content:
Hello people!

How is it going with you guys?

I am doing a visual research on the origins of the ” ? “  
Does anyone know anything about the Question mark?

 [‹ Univers - The cool alternative?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004002/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27508 "Go to previous forum topic") [darth font vader ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004002/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45425 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kj

comments.content: Thanks Simon but im looking for something more than google search and wikipedia

ok, but I think the Wiki is quite in depth. Maybe you’ll find more info from others.

JH
That’s what interlibrary loan is for.
